atbat.des: Alexei Ramirez strikes out on a foul tip.
atbat.des_es: Alexei Ramirez se poncha con foul tip.

pitch.cc: Luis Mendoza is having trouble locating his four-seam fastball, missing the strike zone with his last three.
Luis Mendoza is trying to tie up Alexei Ramirez with fastballs inside; Ramirez is hitting .220 on pitches in that location compared to .265 overall.
Luis Mendoza battled back from 3-0 to retire Alexei Ramirez.

pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Gavin Floyd; Eric Hosmer is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .937 OPS against them this season and .814 against everything else.
